remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures or navigation is not dependent upon its use.

note.para: With MMR (GPS) failure, same side Transponder ADS-B Out Functions will be inoperative. If required, crew may select operative Transponder/GPS combination for ADS-B Out Transmissions.

numlitem.para: Operations in RNP-4 airspace are prohibited.

GPS failure will cause same side Transponder ADS-B Out Functions to be inoperative. One combination of GPS #1/Transponder #1 or GPS #2/Transponder #2 must be operative to ensure ADS-B Out functionality. If not, Flight Control to ensure ADS-B Out is not required along planned route (e.g. Hudson Bay, etc.). Reference IOM Communications Section for Limitations and Procedures.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: " ___ GPS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
